text: A breve, also known as a breve latte or a caffe breve, is an espresso based coffee drink.

title: Wealth
text: Iced coffee is a coffee beverage served cold. It may be prepared either by brewing coffee normally and then serving it over ice.

title: Peace
text: Espresso con panna, which means 'espresso with cream' in Italian, is a single or double shot of espresso
